name: Gemini 3
tagline: Bring any idea to life with multimodal capabilities
description: Our most intelligent model that helps you bring any idea to life.

name: Google Antigravity
tagline: Run and monitor several coding agents at once in an IDE
description: Google Antigravity - Build the new way

name: Alloy
tagline: AI prototyping with your real app
description: Explore ideas with AI prototypes that use your real app. Capture your app from the browser, describe features with AI chat, and get pixel-perfect interactive concepts you can share with your team and customers.

name: Snippets AI
tagline: Advanced AI Prompt Manager
description: Snippets AI solves the huge problem of AI prompts scattered and lost across countless apps. It's the all-in-one prompt manager that replaces Notion, GitHub, and Google Docs for storing your team's AI prompts. Save all your best prompts in one place, organize them effortlessly, and share them with your team instantly.

name: ElevenLabs Image & Video
tagline: The best audio, image & video models now in one platform
description: ElevenLabs now has image and video generation. Generate visuals with top models like Sora, Veo, and Kling, then export to the Studio to add high-quality voiceovers, music, AI sound effects, and captions. It's a unified creative platform.

name: delight.ai
tagline: The AI concierge for customer experience
description: Delight.ai is the branded AI concierge that makes every experience personal and delightful for customers, trusted and profitable for businesses.

name: Bluedot 2.0
tagline: Bot-free AI notetaker for audio and video capture
description: Bluedot is a bot-free AI notetaker that captures, transcribes, and summarizes meetings in the background. Works on any platform and auto-updates your CRM, Notion and more.

name: Ogment MCP-Builder
tagline: Make your product accessible in ChatGPT & Claude, in minutes
description: Ogment MCP-Builder makes your product accessible inside ChatGPT & Claude, in minutes. You can convert APIs, data, docs into a production-ready MCP with evals, auth and analytics built-in—so customers and teams can reliably use your product directly in chat.

name: AI Toolkit by Tiptap
tagline: Build AI that writes IN documents, not next to them
description: Transform your editor into an AI-native experience where AI reads and writes in your documents. AI Toolkit understands selection state, document structure, and context and streams in changes that users can accept or reject. It's the only solution for building the next generation of AI editors with full support for generating custom React nodes and collaborative editing. Works with your existing AI infra (Vercel AI SDK, LangChain, Anthropic). Ships today, works standalone, no cloud dependencies.

name: Link in Bio by beehiiv
tagline: Build a digital home base for your content and products.
description: Until now, Link in Bio tools have lived on yet another platform, totally disconnected from your website, newsletter, and audience. That's why we launched our own Link in Bio feature, which comes fully integrated into your website and content. Because it uses the same theme that powers your site, your Link in Bio automatically matches your website and newsletter for a seamless, on-brand experience.

name: StopBite
tagline: Break the nail biting habit
description: Transform your relationship with nail biting using StopBite, the ultimate companion app designed to help you overcome this habit and achieve healthy, beautiful nails. Create your personalized 90-day plan and track your journey to success!

name: Oura 7.0
tagline: Gain deeper knowledge about your wellbeing
description: The Oura App is more alive than ever with a beautiful new design that keeps everything you love about Oura, but adds more clarity and intuitive navigation. The My Health tab allows you to understand your specific health strengths and opportunities at a glance, while seeing how your habits tie into the bigger picture of your long-term health.

name: AI Design by CapCut
tagline: Your go-to AI designer for e-commerce and social media
description: Introducing CapCut’s next act — AI Design, a design agent unlocking limitless creativity. From posters to thumbnails to cards, if you can imagine it, you can design it. Powered by Seedream 4.0/Nano Banana. Now on CapCut Desktop/Web with 10 free daily uses.

name: Pressdeck
tagline: Create press websites to promote your products
description: Make it easier for journalists and influencers to learn about your product with a beautiful and bespoke press kit website. Get indexed by Google and AI chatbots to always be first. Fully customizable, collaborative, always online and ready to share.

name: Zo Computer
tagline: Build powerful personal software on an intelligent server
description: Create powerful personal software on your intelligent cloud computer. Store your files, connect your tools, then ask AI to do research or work – all in a unified workspace. Build powerful personal software, and host anything – with all your context. Own your data and everything you create – yours to download anytime.

name: AutoSubtitles
tagline: Quick AI subtitles for free with no watermark and no sign up
description: AutoSubtitles.com is a completely free video subtitling tool with zero catches - no watermarks, no signup walls, no hidden fees. Unlike other tools that lock features behind paywalls or brand your videos, we offer unlimited AI transcription at no cost. Add subtitles automatically, customize styling, then export professional-quality videos instantly. It's fast, straightforward, and actually free. Perfect for TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, and more.

name: Sakura
tagline: AI customer support for solo business owners
description: Sakura is the hyper-productive customer support agent you need to run your business. It is an app that connects with your business apps like Whatsapp and Instagram, and replies automatically to your customer DMs based on your business data/guidelines.

name: Lumical
tagline: Scan to add to your calendar & stop typing meetings manually
description: Turn any meeting invite, poster, or flyer into a calendar event in seconds. Point your camera, let Lumical's AI extract the details, and save to Apple Calendar. No typing required!

name: Notate.so
tagline: All-in-one Notion web clipper & Notion-AI context generator
description: Highlight text, videos, and PDFs, jot quick notes, organize in collections, and jump back to the exact spot with Auto‑Scrollback. With one single action, Notate generates perfect context for Notion AI—no copy‑paste, no tab‑hopping.

name: AidaJet
tagline: Create, design, schedule and analyze Newsletters with AI
description: Newsletters are powerful, but creating them consistently is a pain. AidaJet, a multi-agent AI platform, automates content, scheduling, and analytics, so you can focus on growing your business. Already, 1500+ professionals are using AidaJet to engage audiences effortlessly. It’s free to try — see how AI can power your growth.
